channel.title: R on Chris Umphlett
channel.description: Recent content in R on Chris Umphlett

item.title: Little Leaders Musician Flipbook
item.description: For Women’s History Month 2019 my first-grade daughter and I did a project together to celebrate the musical artists featured in Vashti Harrison’s books Little Leaders and Little Dreamers. We created a flipbook with the xarangan package for R and RStudio. Here is a link to the flipbook.

item.title: Creating a car maintenance log and reminders with R and SQL Server
item.description: For years I used an Excel workbook with VBA to track our vehicles’ preventive maintenance and notify me when something was needed. This process hasn’t worked well the last couple years as the laptop with MS Office and the scheduled task is rarely left on when it is scheduled to run. I had also failed to account properly for some maintenace tasks that had never been done, but I intended to do, within a few years after purchasing the vehicles.

item.title: Dynamic resume's built in R with the vitae package
item.description: A couple of months ago I came across the vitae package which was recently developed by Mitchell O’Hara Wild. I have been using the same basic resume template for over 10 years, mainly by default, but I really liked the layout offered by one of the vitae templates and the ability to build it with R Markdown turned a chore into something fun to do (keeping the resume current).
